task_description: **Financial Advisor (FA):** Hello! I'm your advisor, here to assist you with your financial goals.**Individual (I):** Hi! I'm interested in building a diversified portfolio and looking for Emerging Markets Portfolio. I consider myself aggresive in terms of risk, and I have $$50,000 to allocate.**FA:** Sounds good... Any other requirement ?**I:** hmmm, yes, I am looking for something that offers research and recommendations for self-directed investors.**FA:** You're taking a proactive step towards financial success!
